general.name: photoUSNOB
general.description: Match of objects in a field of an SDSS imaging catalog to the USNO-B catalog . These matches are to any objects which are RUN_PRIMARY according to the local resolve (see resolve documentation ).

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another
